name: Heavy Duty Cordless Drill Set
description: The PowerMaster Heavy Duty Cordless Drill Set is designed for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. This versatile drill features a high-torque motor that delivers up to 600 RPM, making it perfect for a wide range of tasks including drilling holes, driving screws, and assembling furniture. The set includes two lithium-ion batteries for extended use, a fast charger, and a selection of drill bits and screwdriver attachments. The ergonomic design ensures comfortable use during prolonged projects, while the included carrying case keeps everything organized and easily accessible. Whether you're tackling home repairs or working on a construction site, this drill set is built for durability and performance.
